arts.ttl: Millwall boss has praise for goalscorer Josh Coburn as he talks about frontline starting dilemma
arts.sum: Alex Neil spoke of his delight for Josh Coburn after the 22-year-old Millwall loanee scored the winner for the second successive Championship away game. Coburn’s decisive goal came after Casper De Norre had equalised for Millwall, who were very much second best in the first half and were fortunate not to find themselves further behind.

arts.ttl: Millwall boss gives verdict as his side end wait for a Championship comeback win
arts.sum: “Tuesday night was disappointing in the fact that I didn’t think we did a huge amount going forward, ” said Lions head coach Neil. Goals from Casper De Norre and Josh Coburn cancelled out Mattie Pollock’s first-half opener as the Lions sealed a 2-1 win at Vicarage Road today.
How the game at Vicarage Road unfolded as Watford excellent for 45 minutes but awful in the second half.

arts.ttl: Millwall hit back to win at Watford
arts.sum: Josh Coburn completed Millwall's comeback as Alex Neil's side came from behind to beat Watford 2-1 at Vicarage Road.

arts.ttl: Hornets stung by late Millwall comeback at Vicarage Road
Millwall goalkeeper Liam Roberts gets six-game ban for Mateta challenge
arts.sum: FA pushed for longer ban than standard three matches Challenge left Crystal Palace striker needing 25 stitches The Millwall goalkeeper Liam Roberts is to serve an extended six-match ban for his challenge on Jean-Philippe Mateta after an appeal by the Football Association. Roberts said he accepted unequivocally “the red card as awarded and accept my punishment” and reiterated his apologies to the Crystal Palace striker, describing himself as “devastated” by the incident. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Liam Roberts: Millwall goalkeeper issues statement as FA increase ban for challenge on Crystal Palace's Jean-Philippe Mateta
arts.sum: Millwall goalkeeper Liam Roberts issues a statement after having his three-match ban for a dangerous challenge on Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta increased by the Football Association.

arts.ttl: Watford confirm Cleverley signed a three-year contract in April
arts.sum: Chairman Scott Duxbury has used his programme notes for tomorrow's game to confirm the length of the contract the head coach agreed in April.

arts.ttl: Liam Roberts handed six-game ban for Mateta horror challenge
arts.sum: Millwall goalkeeper Liam Roberts has had his three-match ban upgraded to six games following his reckless red card challenge on Crystal Palace forward Jean-Philippe Mateta. Roberts connected with Mateta’s face with a wild kick during Millwall’s 3-1 defeat to Crystal Palace in the FA Cup last weekend. The French forward was forced off and required […] The post Liam Roberts handed six-game ban for Mateta horror challenge first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Millwall goalkeeper breaks silence on ban and reveals private Jean-Philippe Mateta gesture
arts.sum: Millwall goalkeeper Liam Roberts has been handed an extended six game ban following the challenge which injured Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta last weekend
